name: Sunday School
description: Class-style Sunday School with something for all ages. Join us as we learn from God's Word.

name: Gospel Meetings
description: Public speaking style gospel meetings where the plain and simple Gospel is preached. All are welcome.

name: Bible Study & Prayer
description: Midweek Bible study and prayer meeting. Come grow in your knowledge of God's Word and fellowship with other believers.

name: Missionary Support
description: Supporting missionaries who share the Gospel through literature distribution, gospel meetings, special outreaches, and teaching new believers through home Bible studies.
